function RIR_EP04_04()
    -- .起-2【11月第2週】「仮装恋愛」
    SaveData.Title = "仮装恋愛"

    -- //BG：1-A教室（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ That afternoon after school, while waiting in the classroom, Lira-san arrived as promised. ]])

PLAY_BGM("BGM08.wav")

    -- //BU：リラ（苦笑）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fc")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0659.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Sorry to keep you waiting. It's bad of me to have made you cancel an important meeting for my sake." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1378.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "That's alright. Lira-san, you seemed different since this morning, so I was worried." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1379.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "So, what exactly did you want to talk about?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0660.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Ah, um, well, that is..." ]])

    MSG([[ Lira-san, unusually hesitant, fidgeted with her hands awkwardly. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07hb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0661.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Actually, well... my twin sister Riko apparently likes someone." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1380.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Likes? Riko-san? Likes who?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0662.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Uh... you know... your cousin." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1381.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Cousin?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Huh? What does that mean? ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1382.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Did I ever introduce my cousin?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0663.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Y-Yes, yes! You definitely introduced her to us!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0664.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "So I mean—not me—I mean Riko was able to get in touch! You even exchanged RINE contacts, right!?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1383.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "W-What? Ah—" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Cousin... no way... ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0665.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Riko has liked Minato-kun for a while now! Seriously! I mean seriously, seriously!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ha")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1384.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Fwaa..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ For the first time in my life, I was confessed to. Well, right now I'm Erika, so it's secondhand, but still. ]])

    MSG([[ Ugh, I don't know how I should react... ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0666.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "It's not like you should be embarrassed... I was surprised when Riko told me too, and even now my heart feels like it's gonna burst." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ha")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1385.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Y-Yes, that's right! Sorry... It's just that being so close to Minato, it's hard to think of it like someone else's matter..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Actually, it’s not someone else’s matter... ]])

    MSG([[ I desperately forced my heart, which felt like it might jump out, to calm down. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0667.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Getting to the point, Erika, I want you to help bring Riko and Minato-kun together." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0668.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Ah! Of course, if Minato-kun already has a girlfriend... then the story’s totally different." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1386.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "N-No! That’s not the case at all! There's no girlfriend whatsoever!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1387.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Being so close, I don’t really get why Minato’s so appealing. Um… why do you think Riko fell for Minato?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1388.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "You probably haven’t talked directly to Minato much, right?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0669.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Uh, y-yeah..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0670.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "You know, Riko’s not cute at all, right? But Minato-kun treats her normally without any ulterior motives, and that kindness drew her in." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0671.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Ah! Of course that’s what Riko told me!? My memory’s fuzzy, so I’m not sure if it’s completely right! Haha!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1389.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Minato’s kindness?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

    -- //BG：駅前
    FILTER_SCREEN(2)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG002aa")
    -- //effect：セピア加工
    -- //BU：リコ（ウインク）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIK01ia")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask035" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ I recalled the first time I met Riko-san. ]])

    MSG([[ On entrance exam day, I happened to rescue Riko-san, who was protecting a girl being surrounded by a group of men in front of the station. ]])

    MSG([[ Honestly, I just acted naturally given the situation. ]])

    MSG([[ Unlike Riko-san, who actively helped the girl involved. ]])

    MSG([[ To me, Riko-san, who saved the girl being harassed, seemed like a much kinder person. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1390.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (But... I’m glad she thought that much of my actions.) ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1391.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Even someone like me... can be liked by someone." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000ab")
    FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask035",1000,false)

    -- //BG：1-A教室（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014ba")
    -- //BU：リラ（驚き）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0672.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Erika...?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1392.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Ah! S-Sorry! Of course I’ll help! I’m sure Minato will be really happy when he knows Riko has feelings for him." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0673.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "R-Really... haha." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1393.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "So, how can I help? Please tell me anything." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0674.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Could we go on a date as the three of us this weekend? Riko would find going one-on-one too difficult at first." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1394.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Th-Three people? Minato would be fine with that, but I, um, already have plans..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0675.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "I-I see. Actually, I also have something to do, so I can’t join. What a pain... Minato probably wouldn’t want a one-on-one date, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1395.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "That’s not true, he’d be thrilled." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0676.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "You spoke confidently there." ]])

    MSG([[ —Damn it! It’s my own matter, but talking about it like it’s someone else’s causes problems! It’s complicated! ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1396.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I- I just think so. Minato spends his weekends cooking or gaming." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07fc")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0677.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Well, that’s good. Sorry to ask, but can you tell Minato and ask him to keep that time free?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0678.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "I’m sure after that, Riko will contact him directly on RINE." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1397.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Understood. I’ll make sure to inform Minato responsibly." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0679.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Thanks, Erika! I’ll tell Riko myself then. Bye-bye<sprite="Emoji" name="star">" ]])

    -- //BU：なし
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    MSG([[ After saying that, Lira-san left the classroom. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1398.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "……………………" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ha")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1399.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Riko-san... likes me..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Alone, I replayed the conversation with Lira-san and felt a strange mix of happiness and embarrassment rise up, nearly making me make a weird noise. ]])

    MSG([[ I never imagined that the real me would ever be liked by a girl. ]])

    MSG([[ My heart raced wildly with this first experience, my body burning hot as if it would melt away from the heat. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ha")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1400.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "C-Calm down... The weekend date is important, but first, I need to talk to Hermes-san tomorrow." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I forced my racing heart to calm down, for the time being. ]])

    MSG([[ Just before Marika-nee fell ill this March, Hermes-san defeated her in the Princess Election and took the Princess title. ]])

    MSG([[ The person who now holds the biggest clue to saving Marika-nee must be Hermes-san. ]])

    MSG([[ No matter what, I must get answers from Hermes-san— ]])

    -- //BG：駅前
    FILTER_SCREEN(2)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG002aa")
    -- //effect：セピア加工
    -- //BU：リコ（ウインク）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIK01ia")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ha")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1401.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "............" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //BG：1-A教室（夕方）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG014ba")
    FILTER_SCREEN(0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 500,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1402.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "—Hah! Idiot, idiot, I’m such an idiot! Focus more, focus! I have to save Marika-nee..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Until I save Marika-nee, there’s no time for love. ]])

    MSG([[ Even though I know that clearly, I can’t help but smile at the thought of someone liking me. ]])

    MSG([[ That made me feel pathetic beyond words. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RIR_EP04_05")
end
